website_summaries.verdict: Fit for any little prince or princess, these premium organic cotton burp cloths are extra large, indulgently soft, and exceptionally absorbent.
pros: Made of high-quality GOTS-certified organic cotton
Free of pesticides, chemicals, and dyes
Inner fleece layer for superior absorbency
Good size, and preshrunk to prevent post-washing disappointment
cons: Somewhat pricey, but the quality is exceptional

customer_reviews.title: Amazing burp cloths but may get misshapen when dried
customer_reviews.text: These are great burp cloths. I will give them 5 stars but will say this: They get a little misshapen every time I dry them. It’s like the fleece interior is not totally attached to the cotton exterior and rolls up inside. I have to remove them promptly from tumble dry low and vigorously shake them out. As if they’re covered in dust and I’m shaking the dust off. This seems to help prevent the inner fleece from rolling around the edges but some of the burp cloths are still not perfect and have lumps inside. That being said, they are super huge, super absorbent, love the designs, and I would still recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: highflyer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and great
customer_reviews.text: Size is great! I use them for everything (nursing, diaper changing pad, burp cloth, etc). The colors are great and their soft. One critique is that when you wash them, the batting in the middle can shift and cause wrinkles. Instead of drying them in the dryer, I shake them after the washer and line dry them. This eliminates the wrinkles, but is annoying to remember to remove them from the dryer load.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, absorbent, and very cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are AMAZING. They’re much thicker than any other burp cloth I’ve ever owned. They’re very absorbent and not to mention very cute. Didn’t take as long to hang dry as some other reviews stated. 10/10 would recommend and I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: KayleaFite

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent!!
customer_reviews.text: Theeevse my favorite burp cloths out of several different brands I was gifted. These are cute minimalistic patterns and soft to the touch. I am so happy these are extra large is size and cover your shoulder generously and drape down over the back. Wasn’t sure if these would shrink after washing but, nope, they stayed long and wide and super absorbent. I’ll be ordering more for my baby boys teething period then.
customer_reviews.author: Alonna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all-purpose baby cloth
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 brands since this was my first baby - Burts Bees, Kea, and these. These are my favorite by far. They’re a fantastic size (biggest of the 3) and the thickness is perfect. They’re thin enough to wipe the baby’s face carefully, but thick enough that nothing is going to soak through them. Plus I’m pretty sure they were priced the best too. I use them under the baby while side-lying nursing, to mop up a massive spit-up, to dab her mouth after a small spit-up, or to lay across my breast if I’m leaking and one of these is within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stained.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these last minute because I didn’t think I had enough burp cloths. Overall, they are not bad. My only issue is that I received one that had a stain on it.... it even had one of those little arrow stickers pointing to the imperfection. Why would the company send this?! I’m not going to return it, because I needed them and obviously burp cloths get dirty. But what the heck???
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not all cotton
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely filled with a layer of foam, not 100% cotton if it has a filing. They are large which is nice but I don’t like that they have a filling.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good but looses much value after washing
customer_reviews.text: Still good burp clothes but updating review after washing. After washing once they shrunk a good bit and are not so soft anymore like when first received.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bieber

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths hands down
customer_reviews.text: Legitimately one of the best purchases for my newborn yet. These are used every day without fail because they are so soft, comfortable for my babe's head, absorbent and useful. Only thing to note is that, due to their amazing absorption level, they do hold on to whatever liquid gets in the material, which is often spit up or breast milk for me... So they must be laundered on super hot, or at least be given a solid soak before washing. But phenomenal quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and another cheaper one because I couldn’t understand why these cost so much more but I now know. These are worth 10x the cheap ones. I don’t need to do more laundry for a couple dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and great size
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! The size and shape are perfect for laying under baby as well as wiping up. I use them as impromptu changing pads, to line the stroller basinet in case of spit up or leaks, as an extra layer on the boppy for nursing... They are super absorbent and soft against the baby. I wish they made an even larger size to use as a puddle pad! Prints are great and they look cool in baby photos!
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn Hall

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Love these burn clothes! They are the perfect size, so soft, absorbs well, and cute patterns. I highly recommend these! Perfect gift for yourself or someone else expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Truly Organic, Large Burp Cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously amazing- a fantastic size, great absorbancy, cute prints that come boxed, and actually organic (I've purchased others on Amazon claiming to be so in their item listings, but when the products arrived there wasn't even a label describing the manufacturing materials)!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: I’d order more of these for sure!
customer_reviews.text: These have become our favorite and most dependable burp cloths! Super absorbent Soft Fun prints Oversized for over-the-shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths I've found!
customer_reviews.text: My little one spits up A LOT so finding great quality burp cloths was a necessity for me since we go through so many. I love these because they are very big, soft and great quality. They also look nice which is important when you constantly need to have a burp cloth on your shoulder :) I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Bosinoff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are such high quality. Love them. Super thick and absorb a lot, plus they are cute!
customer_reviews.author: JacksonEsplin

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure how effective these burp cloths would be due to the thickness of the fabric, but I love them. My baby spits up often and the material is very absorbent. The cloths are also wide, which is great to cover more of him and myself after feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marie

customer_reviews.title: They are very large and is nice so you dont get spit up all over you
customer_reviews.text: They are very large and is nice so you dont get spit up all over you. The only town side is even with following washing directions they became mis-shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and soft
customer_reviews.text: A little big compared to our wash clothes we use. but it’s good for more coverage. Soft and pillow-y.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh S Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Great burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are great burp clothes. They're thick, soft, and super stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Elski

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: We have ended up with a lot of narrow burp cloths as gifts, but we have a wild burper who also spits up beyond those cloths. We saw that these were wider and were happy to find they are very soft and absorbent as well. The designs are nice and we'd definitely order again for ourselves or as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best Burp Cloths!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible, the best burp cloths I own (and we have about 5 different kinds)! Very large and super absorbent - they are just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: Thick and absorbs lots of spit up. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! 1st wash they got all misshapen! You would think that the middle would be seen in but is not so gets all twisted in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kesti

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths.
customer_reviews.text: I love these burp cloths they are my absolute favorite!! I only wish they had more colors and styles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and soft
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these and another set of burp cloths. I liked these far better. Double sided, soft, thick and I love the prints. I ended up purchasing a second set after my dog chewed through a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Case

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Big but not too big, we use this every day!
customer_reviews.author: Bekki

customer_reviews.title: Best Burp Cloth
customer_reviews.text: These are the best burp cloths I have found. My baby spits up a lot and I was going through them like crazy. Because of the absorbency I can keep one all day! And they’re super soft and come in cute patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these burp clothes. Great size, highly absorbent, I think they look nice. I actually ended up getting a second pack.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Given as a baby shower gift for a nature lover. Big hit.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKCat

customer_reviews.title: Inviting and soft
customer_reviews.text: We have just unpacked the burp cloths, and we haven't washed them yet. However, they are very soft and seem very practical with the unisex tones and the reversible option. The material seems excellent, and they are very well made. Perfect for a calm and nurturing environment.
customer_reviews.author: A Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: favorite burp rags!
customer_reviews.text: We have many burp rags, and these are our ABSOLUTE favorite. They are wide enough to cover most of your shoulder, and very thick so that spit won’t leak through to your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: These burp rags are a good size and very absorbent.. would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable long term quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved these burp clothes initially, but after a few washes a few of them are coming apart at the seams. I received them for my baby shower and now the return window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Toby G.

customer_reviews.title: I love these Burp Cloths!
customer_reviews.text: They are really thick and absorbent. The patterns are very cute. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great patterns/Very durable
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these. They are nice and thick. Perfect size to fit over my shoulder or to wipe up a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: Love these burp cloths. They are large enough, the right shape and so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Schurtz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to throw over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: Prints are fun. Does. Inch a tiny bit out of dryer but stretches back easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Copland-Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby, happy momma
customer_reviews.text: So soft for baby and comfortable for momma to rest on shoulder. Very pretty for either a boy or girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: WE love our burp cloths. They absorb well and don't get all crusty like the other ones we have.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Helwig

customer_reviews.title: And perfect quality! Baby isn't born so I haven't got ...
customer_reviews.text: They're the cutest! And perfect quality! Baby isn't born so I haven't got to use them yet but I guarantee they will be wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: micah monroe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and absorbent. Large enough to stay on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. Fabric is soft and very absorbent. Designs are gender neutral and very original.

customer_reviews.title: Love!! So worth!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something absorbent, attractive, large and not expensive.. and I am happy to say that I have found it! I looked at Aden and Anais because I love their swaddles but 2 for 20 really? I needed like 15 burp clothes because my LO spits up. What is two going to do for me... I looked at other target brands... doesn’t feel nice Ultimately there are two I recommend.m: this one and gerber baby cloth diapers! It is 10 for $13. So worth. So those are my “ugly” super absorbent one and this one is my more “fashionable” one
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when these arrived bed as it’s been fun setting up our nursery. I gave these a wash to prepare them (regular cycle) and one already has a huge rip in it! Two others show sign of threads loosening. DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sittirug

customer_reviews.title: Thick, soft and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Soft, thick and absorbent. Cushy for burping baby over the shoulder. Wash and dry well. Directions call for lying flat after drying; I haven’t done that and they’ve held up fine so far. Dog did eat part of one, so I got a good look at the interior, and it’s nice and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Linley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent even after washing a million times
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Size is excellent. I’ve washed these a million times and they hold up. My only complaint would be the slight separation between the layers but it doesn’t stop these burp cloths from doing their job. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Baby soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Organic cotton is absorbant and super soft. Size is perfect for baby on shoulder or use as a bib/wipe during feeding. The colors/prints are gender neutral and pleasing to the eye. 6 in the package keeps buying to a minimum. Great gift for a new baby.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these oversized burp cloths! They’re super absorbent and very cute
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite burp cloths for my twins (who spit up a lot!) very soft, large, and absorbent! Bought a few different sets. Always my go to!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Burp Clothes
customer_reviews.text: Good Burp Clothes. Big enough to catch the baby's milk. Nice soft feel. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: High quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Note the size...bigger than actually expected but very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are by the far the nicest burp cloths I have found! Cant wait to use them
customer_reviews.author: Kristie wnuk

customer_reviews.title: Great large size
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - The largest and most absorbent burping cloths that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The burp cloths are plush, absorbent & stylish! The size is great for more coverage. These would be a great baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cambria Baby Organic Cotton Premium Burp Cloths. XL Coverage. 2 Outer Layers of Organic Cotton w/Absorbent Inner Layer of Polyester Fleece. Reversible. Grays for Boys and Girls. Chemical-Free. 6 Pack
feature_bullets: CAMBRIA BABY ORGANIC COTTON PREMIUM BURP CLOTHS. A 6-pack of super absorbent burp cloths in gender neutral colors and patterns. The soft, organic cotton is gentle on your baby’s delicate skin.

ULTRA SOFT AND DURABLE FABRIC. The 10” x 22” of organic cotton fabric (with an inner layer of absorbent polyester fleece) offers maximum shoulder protection for any messes your little one may make. Quality pre-shrunk materials maintain their shape even after multiple washes.

FREE FROM HARMFUL CHEMICALS AND TOXIC DYES. Every material is carefully chosen for your baby’s comfort and well-being. No toxic chemicals are used in growing and processing the organic cotton. These burp cloths are conveniently washable.

FOR YOUR BABY AND THE ENVIRONMENT. All of Cambria Baby’s products are produced with the health of both your baby and the Earth in mind. A cleaner environment today means a cleaner environment to last your child a lifetime.

100% CERTIFIED ORGANIC COTTON. Cambria Baby’s products meet the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS). This ensures the organic cotton is meticulously farmed and manufactured to achieve the highest level of environmental and social responsibility.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
